overview: Jamaican singer, DJ and producer Tony Rebel showcases the top names in reggae, dub and dancehall for his annual music festival, the Rebel Salute. The 40-act roster features both local and international artists, including Luciano, Richie Spice, I Wayne, Terry Linen, Ras Shiloh, Chezidek, Aaron Silk, Live Wyya, Tarrus Riley, Abdel Wright, Peter Lloyd, Marcus-I, Ras Honeycomb, Phit Watkis, Sisa Band and Shane.
title: Rebel Salute: Roots Singers
